00037 #define GetAndWait_(dest, src, size) memcpy(dest, (void*)(src), size)
00038 #define PutAndWait_(src, dest, size) memcpy((void*)(dest), src, size)

00040 #define GetAndWait(dest, src, size) GetAndWait_((char *)(dest), (unsigned int)(src), size);
